member.name: T:User_Management.IniInfo
member.summary: Structure of the information from other projects required to initialize the main class

member.name: F:User_Management.IniInfo.Window
member.value: Main window of the application. Is used to attach the MessageBoxes to it

member.name: T:User_Management.UserManagement
member.summary:
This class allows the update of the access table variable. The access table can then be used by other projects to allow or avoid accesses.
Creation revision: 001

member.name: M:User_Management.UserManagement.UpdateAccessTable(System.String,System.String)
member.returns: The name of role of the windows account username

member.name: M:User_Management.UserManagement.SetNoneAccess
member.summary: Update the current access table with the guest rights
member.returns: True if the table was updated, false otherwirse
